charges.charge_description: Count 1: Illegal re-entry into the United States (found in); 8 USC 1326(a) and (b)(1)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 21 months BOP. Court waives SRT and Fine. Special Assessment $100.00 remitted.

charges.charge_description: 8:1326(a)(1)(b)(1) Alien who had previously been denied admission, excluded, deported, or removed, knowingly and unlawfully was present in the United States, said defendant having not obtained the consent of the Attorney General or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to reapply for admission into the United States
